options.name: output-dir
options.description: Directory where output files are written. Default: input file directory

options.name: format
options.description: Output formats (comma-separated). Values: json, text, html, pdf, markdown, markdown-with-html, markdown-with-images. Default: json

options.name: content-safety-off
options.description: Disable content safety filters. Values: all, hidden-text, off-page, tiny, hidden-ocg

options.name: keep-line-breaks
options.description: Preserve original line breaks in extracted text

options.name: replace-invalid-chars
options.description: Replacement character for invalid/unrecognized characters. Default: space

options.name: use-struct-tree
options.description: Use PDF structure tree (tagged PDF) for reading order and semantic structure

options.name: reading-order
options.description: Reading order algorithm. Values: none, xycut. Default: none

options.name: markdown-page-separator
options.description: Separator between pages in Markdown output. Use %page-number% for page numbers. Default: none

options.name: text-page-separator
options.description: Separator between pages in text output. Use %page-number% for page numbers. Default: none

options.name: html-page-separator
options.description: Separator between pages in HTML output. Use %page-number% for page numbers. Default: none

options.name: embed-images
options.description: Embed images as Base64 data URIs instead of file path references

options.name: image-format
options.description: Output format for extracted images. Values: png, jpeg. Default: png
